title: bAlakrSNa mAm pAhi
sahitya:
bAlakrSNa mAm pAhi pAhi nandabAla pAlita sAdhu jana brnda


anupallavi

  nIla nIrada shyAma sundara nikhila lOkAdhAra dAmOdarA


caraNam    sadaya nityAnanda mrdu padAravinda svAmin shrI gOvinda vAmanA mukunda
yadu tilaka gOpAla mukura nibha kapOla yami hrdaya salIlA kamalajA vilOlA
